snippet: Wall Street stocks closed lower after retail sales fell for a second straight month and producer prices dropped more sharply than expected.
abstract: Wall Street stocks close lower after retail sales fall for a second straight month and producer prices drop more sharply than expected; investors also worry that Greece will leave the euro zone after its elections.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street stocks closed lower after retail sales fell for a second straight month and producer prices dropped more sharply than expected.

headline.seo: Shares Fall on Fears Over Greek Elections
headline.main: Shares Fall on Fears Over Greek Elections
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall on Fears Over Greek Elections
